item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Nirvana.Marijuana Nirvana.Marijuana
item.description:
@Nirvana.Marijuana wrote:

Look for

/*THEIVING*/

Then look straight under you should see something like this Replace that with this it gives 80k xp per steal

[code]public int theifTimer = 0;

public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int delay, int emote) {

if(theifTimer == 0) {
if(playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) {
setAnimation(emote);
sendMessage("You steal from the "+stallName);
sendMessage(message);
addItem(item, itemAmount);
addSkillXP(80000, 17);
theifTimer = delay;
}
else if(playerLevel[17] < lvlReq) {
sendMessage(“You need a theiving level of “+lvlReq+” to theif from this stall.”);
}
}
}[/code]

Hope this Helped

~Nirvana~

Read full topic
